api.title: MARLIN API
api.subtitle: Programmatic access to all sensor data via our RESTful API
api.accessDescription: The data is offered via a paid API.
api.readyDescription: Contact us for detailed API documentation and pricing information.
api.documentationDesc: Explore our complete Swagger documentation for all API endpoints, request/response schemas, and authentication details.

features.restfulDesc: Standard HTTP methods with JSON responses. Complete documentation with examples and authentication available.
features.realTimeDesc: Access to live sensor data with minimal latency for up-to-date measurements and monitoring.
